name: acci-nest
description: Multi-tenant, plugin-extensible platform built with NestJS and React using Bun runtime

scripts.start:dev: bun run concurrently "bun run start:backend:dev" "bun run start:frontend:dev"
scripts.build: bun run --cwd src/backend build && bun run --cwd src/frontend build
scripts.test: bun run --cwd src/backend test && bun run --cwd src/frontend test
scripts.test:cov: bun run --cwd src/backend test:cov && bun run --cwd src/frontend test:cov
